Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time elapsed from the first 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' until 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time for all instances of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to lead to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time between 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and the subsequent 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' until any action taken by a reviewer (either 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' or 'SW-Reviewer Declined')
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'Assign a Different Editor' in cases where the initial reviewer selection process fails
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Total time for 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' until 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision', considering the entire review cycle
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'SW-EIC Major Revision' or 'SW-EIC Minor Revision', indicating the impact on decision-making time
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' in cases leading to manuscript acceptance ('RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' to 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2', indicating efficiency in reviewer response follow-up
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
